name: How Little We Wait
description:
How Little We Wait is a classic Point & Click Adventure. You will need to uncover the mystery behind the two strangers you meet who are both imprisoned by their past mistakes. Escape the room that binds you to the past by collecting and combining the scattered items around this otherworldly room that you find yourself trapped in. You only have a minute before the man counts down to zero before he walks out of the room and mysteriously walks in from the other end of the room resetting the room to it's past self. Can you find an exit before you end up trapped forever?



This game is intended to be beaten within a fast time limit. Repetition and quick learning are key factors needed to successfully uncover the truth behind the situation you are caught in. The full truth will only be awarded to those who uncover every possible clue in the room.
